title: Weather-App
description: This weather app allows users to search for the current weather conditions of a specific location.

title: Car Rental service
description: A simple car rental system developed using Java, demonstrating basic operations for managing cars, customers, and rentals.

title: To-Do App
description: Developed a To-Do app, allowing users to manage tasks along with features like deletion, addition and sort by status.

title: Grilli - Restaurant website
description: Developed a parallax restaurant website featuring a menu, reservation system, and contact details.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Developed the classic Tic-Tac-Toe game with Interactive gameplay, Win and draw detection and Restart features.
